dict.acceptation: 电子的；电子操纵的；用电子设备生产的；用电子设备完成的；

sent.orig: From the aspect of on-line and off-line, cash, post, electronic card, electronic check and electronic cash-flow.
sent.trans: 两个方向来考虑，提出现金支付、邮局支付、电子信用卡支付、电子支票支付以及电子现金支付等运作方式。

sent.orig: Electronic ceramic, a high-tech material applied in electronic industry, has excellent electronic, thermal and mechanical properties.
sent.trans: 电子陶瓷拥有优良的电学、热学和机械性能，是电子工业中使用广泛的高技术材料。

sent.orig: With analyzing electronic cash and electronic wallet,this paper describes an electronic commerce model and protocol.
sent.trans: 该文在分析电子现金和电子钱包的基础上，提出了一种新的基于电子现金的电子商务安全模型与协议。

sent.orig: High-speed electronic communications media, such as electronic mail and television, tend to prevent meaningfulthoughtful communication. "151."
sent.trans: 高速的电子通讯媒介，如电子邮件和电视，阻止了人们有思想、有意义的交流。

sent.orig: Main business: the production of electronic products transformers, filters, electrical appliances and other electronic originals.
sent.trans: 主要业务：生产电子产品的变压器、滤波器、电器等电子原件。
